items.name: axis
baseColor
items.text: The base color used to generate the Ext.chart.AbstractChart#colors of the theme.

items.name: chart
colors
items.text: Array of colors/gradients to be used by the theme. Defaults to colorDefaults.

items.name: gradients
items.text: The gradient config to be used by series' sprites. E.g.: { type: 'linear', degrees: 90 } Please refer to the documentation for the Ext.draw.gradient.Linear and Ext.draw.gradient.Radial gradients for all possible options. The color Ext.draw.gradient.Gradient#stops for the gradients will be generated by the theme based on the colors config.

items.name: series
seriesThemes
items.text:
An object with the following structure:
{
  fillStyle: [color, color, ...],
  strokeStyle: [color, color, ...],
  ...
}
If missing, generated from the other configs: 'baseColor, 'gradients', 'colors'.

items.name: sprites
factoryConfig
items.text: If this property is specified by the target class of this mixin its properties are used to configure the created Ext.Factory.
